title: How to Make a Blue Long Island Cocktail

steps.headline: Fill a collins glass with ice.
Add ice to a cocktail shaker.
Pour all ingredients except for the Blue Curaçao liqueur into the cocktail shaker.
Cap the shaker and shake the ingredients.
Pour the drink into the collins glass.
Pour the Blue Curaçao into the glass as well.

text: Fill a collins glass with ice.  Add ice to a cocktail shaker.  Pour all ingredients except for the Blue Curaçao liqueur into the cocktail shaker.  Cap the shaker and shake the ingredients.  Pour the drink into the collins glass.  Pour the Blue Curaçao into the glass as well.  Garnish with a lemon wedge.
